entry.title: C/W: discussion of the murder of Indigenous Children * * * *......
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

C/W: discussion of the murder of Indigenous Children
*
*
*
*...
*
“Vigil for Murdered Indigenous Children

AMERICAN INDIAN MOVEMENT OF COLORADO REQUESTS YOUR SOLACE, RAGE & DEMAND FOR JUSTICE

We mourn the 966+ recently unearthed lives taken at the Kamloops and Marieval Residential Schools, in addition to the thousands more Native children stolen through the genocidal boarding school system across the so-called Americas.

OUR CHILDREN ARE SACRED— NOT ONE MORE STOLEN!

July 4th, 2021 7pm
St. John Paul II Center for Evangelization
1300 S Steele St, Denver CO

Wear orange, bring a water bottle and signs. If you are a traditional singer, please bring a hand drum if you have one.”

See More

SUN, JUL 4

Vigil for Murdered Indigenous Children

1300 S Steele St, Denver, CO 80210-2526, United States177 people interested

entry.title: “Wells, who was born a slave in 1862 in Mississippi, was a...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“Wells, who was born a slave in 1862 in Mississippi, was a 30-year-old newspaper editor in Memphis, Tennessee, when she began her campaign against lynching. Wells' crusade was prompted by the 1892 lynching of a man whose first child was her godchild. She traveled the South over several months interviewing witnesses and reading reports of similar events, which she published in the newspaper she co-owned and edited, The Memphis Free Speech and Headlight.”

The Light of Truth Ida B. Wells National Monument is unveiled a year after Wells was awarded a posthumous Pulitzer Prize for her reporting on the lynching of African Americans.

npr.org

A Monument To Journalist, Civil Rights Activist Ida B. Wells Is Unveiled In Chicago

The Light of Truth Ida B. Wells National Monument is unveiled a year after Wells was awarded a posthumous Pulitzer Prize for her reporting on the lynching of African Americans.The Light of Truth Ida B. Wells National Monument is unveiled a year after Wells was awarded a posthumous Pulitzer Prize for her reporting on the lynching of African Americans.

entry.title: AYYYEEEEE! “Rebel forces in Ethiopia's northern Tigray...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

AYYYEEEEE! “Rebel forces in Ethiopia's northern Tigray region have retaken its capital, Mekelle, sparking street celebrations and forcing officials to flee. Residents reported scenes of joy, with fireworks and thousands waving flags.”....
“The fighting has left thousands dead and has pushed 350,000 towards famine. More than two million people have been displaced.” #TigrayGenocide

Supporters celebrate in Mekelle as officials flee the city and the government calls for a ceasefire.

bbc.com

Ethiopia's Tigray conflict: Street celebrations as rebels seize capital

Supporters celebrate in Mekelle as officials flee the city and the government calls for a ceasefire.Supporters celebrate in Mekelle as officials flee the city and the government calls for a ceasefire.

entry.content:
Y’all are showing out! We blew our first goal out of the water. Many many thanks to those who donated and shared the campaign! Today is your LAST DAY to have your donation doubled when you donate through shoot4themoon.org

We are so close to reaching our new goal of $100k! Like, comment, and share to help us get there. Let’s go!

entry.title: It's almost #Juneteenth weekend! We invite you to celebrate with reparative actions by donating to our year-round...
entry.content: It's almost #Juneteenth weekend! We invite you to celebrate with reparative actions by donating to our year-round freedom school at shoot4themoon.org. Help us reach our goal of $10k with matched donations until June 25th! #moonshot #shootforthemoon2021 #denver #education #diverseleaders #leadersofcolor #colorado #diversityandinclusion #diversitydenver #entrepreneurship #entrepreneursofcolor #womenentrepreneurship #socialjustice #socialjusticeeducation #educationequity #impact #community #leadership #innovators #innovation #changeagents #equalitynow #racialequality #genderequality

entry.title: ▶ Did you know that it costs $1000 per student to run the BLM 5280 Freedom School? Did you know that #BLM5280 has...
entry.content:
Did you know that it costs $1000 per student to run the BLM 5280 Freedom School? Did you know that #BLM5280 has offered Freedom School completely FREE of charge since its 2018 launch? We are able to do this because of generous donations made by our community. Until June 25th donations made by visiting shoot4themoon.org will be MATCHED, doubling your impact! Please share this video widely and ask your friends, neighbors, and co-workers to be a part of the incredible work happening at the 5280 Freedom School by making a tax-deductible donation.
https://youtu.be/HiHLRxDwEVI

#moonshot #shootforthemoon2021 #denver #education #diverseleaders #leadersofcolor #colorado #diversityandinclusion #diversitydenver #entrepreneurship #entrepreneursofcolor #womenentrepreneurship #socialjustice #socialjusticeeducation #educationequity #impact #community #leadership #innovators #innovation #changeagents #equalitynow #racialequality #genderequality

entry.title: BLM5280 is hosting a #Covid19 Vaccine Drive in partnership with Denver Department of Public Health and Environment and...
entry.content:
BLM5280 is hosting a #Covid19 Vaccine Drive in partnership with Denver Department of Public Health and Environment and Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr. Early College!!
👉🏿 Insurance is NOT required!
👉🏿 Immigration status is NOT a factor!
Please make your informed decision to get vaccinated and register online at tinyurl.com/BLM5280Vaccine

Help us raise awareness! Like, comment, share, and check our page regularly for more information about the vaccine, and other educational materials as the day approaches.
We can't wait to serve you!

[ID: A white flyer with a purple border, yellow and purple font, and an image of a Black woman receiving the vaccine reads:
Black Lives Matter 5280
Covid-19 Vaccine Drive
in partnership with MLK Jr. Early College and DPHE!
Date: May 25th, 2pm - 7pm
Location: Dr. MLK Jr. Early College, 19535 E 46th Ave
Denver, CO 80249
Vaccine Type: Moderna
Registration Link: tinyurl/BLM5280vaccine
the logos for Dr. MLK Jr. Early College, BLM5280, and DPHE are at the bottom of the flyer]
#BlackHealthMatters #BlackWellnessMatters #Moderna #VaccineDrive #VaccinationEducation #Coronavirus

entry.title: If you are planning to #SpeakOutForGregory by emailing the Chief, here is sample language you are free to use/edit....
entry.content:
If you are planning to #SpeakOutForGregory by emailing the Chief, here is sample language you are free to use/edit. Thank you!!
Email: Vernf@chathamil.net

Dear Chief Foli,

I am writing regarding the shooting of Gregory Small Jr. onMarch 5th. His mother called asking for help for Gregory during a mental health episode and instead of helping Gregory, he was met with life threatening violence at the hands of your police department.

Your department is supposed to provide public safety, including to those with mental illness. Charging Gregory is unacceptable and would only do more harm. He needs medical help not criminal charges.

Please drop ALL charges immediately.

Thank you,

Name

#SpeakOutForGregory
#BlackLivesMatter #MentalHealthAwareness
#MentalHealthAwarenessMonth
#BlackMentalHealthMatters

entry.title: From our comrades at @ccfcdenver : “May 5th is the National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Indigenous...
entry.content:
From our comrades at @ccfcdenver : “May 5th is the National Day of Awareness for Missing and Murdered Indigenous Women, Girls and 2 Spirit folks.

As an organization we unapologetically name that gender violence and femicide are a direct consequence of colonialism throughout Turtle Island (what we now know as Canada, the United States, Latin and South America and the Caribbean).

We also know our sisters in Indian Country are disproportionately impacted by gender violence and murder. We are committed to raising awareness and fighting for more resources to go to Indian Country to find our stolen sisters, solve cases of murdered Indigenous women, and to protect Indigenous women so they can thrive.

Women are the first teachers, women are the carriers of wisdom, and strong medicine and deserve to LIVE in a good way and THRIVE!

#MMIWG #MMIWAWARENESS #NoMoreStolenSisters #LandBack #NiUnaMas 🤎🪶💜🙌🏽♥️ “

entry.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
entry.content:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org

Black Lives Matter 5280

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism.
